title: How to access "CODES" in the store?
body:
Could someone plz tell me where to find this button?
Regards, Portos

replies.body:
I can definitely help you out with this!

After you open the store, look at the upper right hand corner and you'll see a small button with a picture of a person and a cogwheel on it.  Click that, and in the new window that appears, look at the far left side and select "Redeem Codes" right under  "Purchase" History".

Hope this helps!
